display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.

**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=K6ZVrqUgDF0Q7kNvwExHy3b&_nc_oc=AdluRKONqRsNOlEdg9Iz010L3zJQD6rphoD-2t16jGCXSNpw_g-TJ2GRt7JV9haKTAKh9wOGBOQxTr-_Wn_NXUgg&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=5VbL1rec0czXvVFlStqnNw&oh=00_AfHgO7Of6KAGHnzDPASM3-UQqaaKzzxYgDMBNaC4_qeWkA&oe=67FF0D5D)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=eRXLdG9xKXAQ7kNvwGWxqjT&_nc_oc=AdnC40qp3M2lyC3e8TUbgT3ovwW4Nz68_V9z4huZ5I1OCFuTqf5S3bki4OQfi7V4nuhLNn_oBikzGClM7zO3Raij&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=5VbL1rec0czXvVFlStqnNw&oh=00_AfEv-_l_1yMgz23IPZfK9M8w_ZqzxJtoknXqoVSPQ_vRuQ&oe=67FF2752)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75375767_1695057634657861_9198351083050459907_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=l4XSnduvbsMQ7kNvwGWyfGR&_nc_oc=AdnOxmnkZ142_3rnFoK1slXyEYqd_nlvqLswX5_OebkXNhlxZWmymiEldoydzSUVsmOgaTgU9jJujJfF5uRU6H2_&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=5VbL1rec0czXvVFlStqnNw&oh=00_AfF_nYeoRBFtVcNmD91JV91PcyXCsRS8DVYtc-fgch-TuA&oe=67FEF523)



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031608_1046525513655988_8291945262237532410_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=jD9IE1J_DqUQ7kNvwGi8C2h&_nc_oc=Adl1QyaWMVjVqlOn5DZOuwIqwvWG9YkErXGMVPna7zSeljvp6VPq6GaSMs-NOas1M6LnytGhZNL9lisqVnC9VlhK&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=5VbL1rec0czXvVFlStqnNw&oh=00_AfFrDtSBAZAVGYYKGOBNHWikowI44lHXFSwp1fLldZAjhA&oe=67FF23EE)



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
